data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Vayots Dzor, Armenia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vayots Dzor, Armenia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Vayots Dzor to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next month in Vayots Dzor, Armenia.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Vayots Dzor to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Vayots Dzor, Armenia that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Shatin
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Shatin, Vayots Dzor, Armenia.
Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 4,664 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 5,600 citizens of the the state of Vayots Dzor.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Vayots Dzor.
